title: Client Issue
body: Does anyone know how to fix this chat issue, the text i get from someone it always goes on the top and not after what i had sent to a person, i've tried repairing the client still nothing.. any suggestions? (I have attached a link of a photo of the problem)

replies.body:
would they by any chance have their computers time set back a day?

As that could very well be the cause unless your getting this with multiple people.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yHT9ONBv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-19T07:33:49.611+0000)
>
> would they by any chance have their computers time set back a day?
> 
> As that could very well be the cause unless your getting this with multiple people.

Wouldn't it then be the person submitting this issue's computer ahead in time?
As far as I'm aware, this isn't an isolated incident and Riot is currently working on resolving the issue. Hang tight!
